resources.string: TweetFrame was not given access to your Twitter stream.
Really log out? Please note that you will need to restart TwitFrame.
You have no tweets given your current settings. Modify your settings and try again.
Loading... This may take a moment.
Would you like to log in to Twitter now? Please note, if you have logged in previously you may need to clear your cookies.
Please log in before trying to follow me :)
Blasts! There was an error following me. Try again later perhaps?
Awesome! You\'re following me now. Thanks!
TwitFrame is an application that turns your Android device into a frame that streams your Twitter statuses. Dock your device and passively keep up with your friends as their updates come in.
